bill.title: Relating to unclaimed property.
bill.description: Amends abandonment presumptions for securities and distributions. Amends abandonment presumptions for securities and distributions. Shortens length of time until unpaid wages become presumed unclaimed to one year. Establishes owners' rights to income or proceeds from unclaimed property held by State Treasurer until sale. Exempts from disclosure certain records of State Treasurer relating to unclaimed property examinations and claims.
